00109 // Use this macro to wrap all filenames and pathnames that get
00110 // passed directly to a system call, like opening a file, creating
00111 // a directory, checking to see that a file exists, etc...
00112 #if defined(__WXMAC__)
00113 #define OSFILENAME(X) ((char *) (const char *)(X).fn_str())
00114 #else
00115 #define OSFILENAME(X) ((char *) (const char *)(X).mb_str())
00116 #endif
